item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Buffalo Wild Wings - Downtown New Haven's newest wing and beer place. I have a fond, if white-trashish place in my heart for this chain. They have great wings in many flavors, and a surprisingly respectable selection of beer (surprising for a wings place anyway lol). Come check out this new addition to downtown... complete with patio.

Specials: 6pm-7pm $2 Domestic Draft; $3 Well Drinks.


Contact is Devorah (203) 314-4329

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Buffalo Wild Wings Happy hour!
